regen.absent_element: ability to add additional roles after using a template
regen.new_specification: The user shall be able to add additional roles to the user record after creation from a template.
The user shall be able to add additional roles to a user record after it has been created from a template.

regen.absent_element: the ability to add additional roles after inheriting template settings
regen.new_specification: The system shall enable the addition of additional roles to a user record after the roles have been inherited from a template.

label: The user shall be able to add additional roles manually while creating/adding a new user from a user template.
absence: action of adding additional roles when creating from a user template
